trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event occurs when a new area of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> in virtual mode is exposed and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> determines a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>事件發生時的新區域<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>公開虛擬模式和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>決定需要新的項目範圍。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems>事件。

trans-unit.source: The starting index of a range of items needed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> for the next <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: 項目範圍的起始索引，這些項目是發生下一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 事件的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> 所需要。

trans-unit.source: The ending index of a range of items needed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> for the next <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> event that occurs.
trans-unit.target: 項目範圍的結束索引，這些項目是發生下一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 事件的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem" /> 所需要。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs" /> class with the specified starting and ending indices.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的起始和結束索引，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ending index for the range of values needed by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得虛擬模式中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項所需要之值範圍的結束索引。

trans-unit.source: The index at the end of the range of values needed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引，其位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項所需要之值範圍的結尾。

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的值範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>屬性表示的值最有可能需要的虛擬機器範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>的下一個相符項目控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> named `ListView1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>名為`ListView1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index for a range of values needed by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control in virtual mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得虛擬模式中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項所需要之值範圍的起始索引。

trans-unit.source: The index at the start of the range of values needed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 索引，其位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ListView" /> 控制項所需要之值範圍的開頭。

trans-unit.source: The range of values specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A> properties represents the range of values most likely needed by a virtual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control for the next occurrence of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem> event.
trans-unit.target: 所指定的值範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.StartIndex%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CacheVirtualItemsEventArgs.EndIndex%2A>屬性表示的值最有可能需要的虛擬機器範圍<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>的下一個相符項目控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.RetrieveVirtualItem>事件。

trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.CacheVirtualItems?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
